content.rendered:
Classroom Foundational Course

The Classroom Foundation Course has a curriculum that is designed with a thoughtful mix of knowledge and application. The UPSC exam focuses on the capacity of an aspirant to apply the knowledge they learn and the course aims to impart this lesson to its students over several months. The student are tested on their knowledge for both Preliminary and Mains examination through the rigorous testing schedule. 

Every week the students are expected to write the weekly test. After which, a live test analysis highlights relevant information and fills any gap in the student’s knowledge. The faculty goes above and beyond to ensure that the students are well equipped with the knowledge and skills to crack the UPSC exam. 

In addition to this, students are mentored individually by the faculty, who are former civil servants, thereby guiding them to the right track with their preparation. 

A student can choose one of the following variants for the Classroom Programme

Full Course

The full course offers you a comprehensive, all-around development opportunity. It covers the complete range from Preliminary to Mains preparation. It also covers the Optional paper for the student alongside CSAT and Mock Interviews. The Full Course will provide everything you need to help you clear the UPSC exam. We also offer a Mains Crash Course to our students as a bonus after they write the Preliminary exam.

COURSE FEE DISCOUNT NET FEE FOR COMBINED PACKAGE
Full Course – General Studies (Prelims + Mains) + CSAT + Optional + Mock Interview
₹ 1,85,000
₹ 15,000
₹ 1,70,000
Enquire

PCM and Optional

Another variant is for students who have already gone through the foundation course but need a refresher. This can help them gain an ironclad understanding of the syllabus, focusing on the nuances and filling in the gaps in knowledge. Please note that CSAT will not be a part of this package. With the addition of weekly tests and mock interviews, our students are primed to clear the UPSC exam successfully.

COURSE FEE DISCOUNT NET FEE FOR COMBINED PACKAGE
PCM + Optional – General Studies (Prelims + Mains) + Optional + Mock Interview
₹ 1,65,000
₹ 7,000
₹ 1,58,000
Enquire

PCM and CSAT

Students who desire to write the UPSC/IAS exam can go through the classes we provide for the Preliminary cum Mains sessions for our students. We also offer classes for CSAT for our students. Those who go through our rigorous class sessions and clear the Mains exam can enrol in our mock interviews. This program does not include Optional and is suited to those who are undecided on their Optional.

COURSE FEE DISCOUNT NET FEE FOR COMBINED PACKAGE
PCM + CSAT – General Studies (Prelims + Mains) + CSAT + Mock Interview
₹ 1,55,000
₹ 7,000
₹ 1,48,000
Enquire

PCM Course

This course is suited for those who want to prepare for the UPSC exam but are well versed with the CSAT portion. This helps students who want to focus their attentions exclusively on the Preliminary and Mains part of the exam.

COURSE FEE DISCOUNT NET FEE FOR COMBINED PACKAGE
PCM – General Studies (Prelims + Mains) only + Mock Interview
₹ 1,35,000
₹ 5,000
₹ 1,30,000
Enquire

Only Optional Course

Students who want to focus on strengthening their Optional study can enroll in our five-month Optional course. This includes Optional tests that cover both sectional and full Optional tests. This is followed by a post-test discussion where we analyze the model answer for the question and go over important concepts to highlight. Optional Course duration is of 5 Months. We offer the following Optional Subjects out of which one can be chosen. Public Administration, Anthropology, Agriculture, Political Science and International Relations, Geography, History, Law, Sociology, Economics, Psychology, Philosophy, Tamil Literature, Commerce and Accountancy, Geology, English Literature, Mathematics, Medical Science.

COURSE FEE DISCOUNT NET FEE FOR COMBINED PACKAGE
Select Optional Subject
₹ 30,000
-
-
Enquire

Only CSAT Course

This course caters to the students who want to learn to do better in the CSAT paper of the UPSC exam. With rigorous practise sessions combined with a hands-on lecture, your ability to solve quantitative aptitude, logical reasoning, as well as your reading comprehension, will improve dramatically. In addition to our syllabus oriented lectures, you will also receive sectional and full mock tests for CSAT on top of the practice you receive in class.

COURSE FEE DISCOUNT NET FEE FOR COMBINED PACKAGE
CSAT package for – CSAT only (3 months)
₹ 20,000
-
-
Enquire

Batch Details

BATCHES FREQUENCY GS TIMINGS OPTIONAL TIMINGS Remarks
DATE Morning Early Morning Evening Weekend
(Mon-Fri) (Mon-Fri) (Mon-Fri) (Sat&Sun)
CHENNAI CAMPUS

Regular Morning All 7 days 06-06-2022 09:00 AM - 11:30 AM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
* July Batches for 2023 CSE
Early Morning All 7 days 04-07-2022 06:30 AM - 09:00 AM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
Regular Morning All 7 days 07-07-2022 08:00 AM - 10:30 AM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
Evening All 7 days 18-07-2022 05:00 PM - 07:30 PM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
* August Batches for 2023 CSE
Regular Morning All 7 days 08-08-2022 09:30 AM - 12:00 PM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
* September Batches for 2023 CSE
Regular Morning All 7 days 14-09-2022 10:00 AM - 04:00 PM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
* November Batches for 2023 CSE
Regular Morning All 7 days 01-11-2022 01:00 PM - 07:00 PM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON UPCOMING
Optionals Anthropology | Economics | English Literature | Geography | History | Law | Mathematics | Medical Science | Political Science And International Relations | Psychology | Public Administration | Sociology | Tamil Literature Ongoing
BENGALURU CAMPUS
Evening All 7 days 01-08-2022 05:00 PM - 07:30 PM 8:00 AM-12:00 NOON Started
ONLINE
Online All 7 days 25-07-2022 As per Convenience (Live 4:00PM - 6:30PM) Ongoing

Course Design

SCHEDULE for 2022 - 2023
Term 1 Basics of all subjects (NCERT)
Term 2 General Studies - Mains and Prelims + Optional + CSAT
Term 3 Prelims – Revision and Test Series
STAGE 1 UPSC PRELIMS EXAM - JUNE 2023
Term 4 June 2023 – September 2023 Mains – Revision and Test Series
STAGE 2 UPSC MAINS EXAM - SEPTEMBER 2023
Term 5 November 2023 – March 2024 Interview Module, with Mock Interview
STAGE 3 UPSC INTERVIEW - MARCH 2024
